chunk:
Earthley Deep Healing Skin Serum (2020 formulation)

Brand: Earthley

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Hemp seed oil*, cranberry seed oil*, watermelon seed oil*, comfrey*, rose*, and calendula*.

Directions: Gently rub 2-3 drops into skin after cleansing and toning. Best used at night.

Warnings: Safe for the whole family.

Ingredient conc

ly.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Cancer, Use Restrictions; LOW: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
